text.author: Never Mystic, Jodosma, Sedasek and others (see URL)
text.title: Thailand
text.summary: This article explains how and when to perform the respectful Wai hand gesture as a tourist in Thailand, how to dress appropriately at beaches and temples (e.g. taking off shoes at temples and homes), and how to interact with monks, including women not touching or handing things to them and not offering money to Theravada Buddhist monks.
